head.title: Erica Gail Rubinstein and Jay Leon Are Engaged

hedline.hl1: Erica Gail Rubinstein and Jay Leon Are Engaged

block.p: LEAD: Erica Gail Rubinstein and Jay Leon are planning an October wedding. The engagement was announced by the bride's mother, Ricki Rubinstein of Riverdale, the Bronx.

Erica Gail Rubinstein and Jay Leon are planning an October wedding. The engagement was announced by the bride's mother, Ricki Rubinstein of Riverdale, the Bronx.

Miss Rubinstein,31 years old, graduated from Cornell University and received a master's degree in nutritional sciences from New York University. She is an account supervisor with Ogilvy & Mather Public Relations in New York. Her mother is a special assistant in New York to Gov. Mario M. Cuomo. Her father, the late Samuel Aaron Rubinstein, was vice president of Finer Chrome, a furniture manufacturer in New York.

Mr. Leon, 35, is a son of Dorothy Kleinman of Great Neck, L.I., and the late Harvey Leon. A graduate of the Manhattan School of Music with an M.B.A. from Bernard M. Baruch College, he is the director of sales at Camelot Entertainment Sales in New York. His mother is a division manager at Lloyd Personnel Consultants in Great Neck. His father was a restaurant manager.
